name: Test Subject 901
description: Trudge through haunting halls and desolate rooms, teleport through the darkness and hide in the shadows as you plan your escape. Feel your heart race as your doom looms ever closer. Find a way out before your fate is sealed.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 equivalent or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
